thread.title: Sue
thread.title_full: I FIND MARBELLA evaluado por Sue

author: Sue
title: Sue
text: Huge thanks specifically to Tony for his incredible high level of support and co-operation with our recent property purchase in Spain. We have been hugely impressed with the excellent service, professionalism and prompt co-operation throughout the whole process. Steve made it all quite effortless and was on hand to help at all times, often late at night when normally you would never get a response! Having the confidence to know that we had contact 'on the ground' locally whilst we were out of the country made the whole transaction very straightforward and seemless. We simply couldn't have done it otherwise and remain hugely grateful to Steve and I FIND MARBELLA. Would highly recommend to anyone. Thank you Steve and the team, you are truly our superstars.
